title: Do anyone live near ramurthy nagar , Kasturi Nagar Or Horamavu?
content: If yes how do you commute to PES EC campus

comments.body: Thanks , but the bus leaves by 5 pm in the evenings so , I would be a waste of time sometimes , is there any alternatives other than BMTC and PES Bus
No there is no alternative apart from pes bus and bmtc, the metro line between kr pura and silkboard ll probably  take another 10 years ,so only thing u can use is bmtc
Yeah thanks , I guess Iâ€™ll stick to PES BUS

Aren't these areas kinda near to baiyappanahalli and kr metro stations?. 
Get to there and from there direct metro till Nayandahalli.

Nayandahalli to pes is like 5 mins and there are dozens of buses.
He can use metro purple right?.
